sys_update_xml.name: user_criteria_47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="user_criteria"><user_criteria action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><advanced>true</advanced><company/><department/><group/><location/><match_all>false</match_all><name>Item  visibilité</name><role/><script><![CDATA[/** Scripted User Criteria is not cached, and evaluated everytime, so performance is dependent on the script.
* Populate `answer` with true/false or evaluate to true/false
* The script is evaluated in the scope the user criteria is defined
* Don't use `current` in the script or populate the variable
* Don't use `gs.getUser()` or  `gs.getUserID()`, 
* instead use `user_id` which contains the user sys_id against whom the evaluation is happening.
*/
var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
userGR.get(user_id);
if(userGR.preferred_language == 'fr') {
answer = true;
}
else {
answer = false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>user_criteria</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 12:16:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Item  visibilité</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>user_criteria_47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-08 12:16:34</sys_updated_on><user/></user_criteria></record_update>
